Architecture and Performance Engineering</h1>\n\n    </div>\n\n</header>\n\n\n<div class=\"wrapper\">\n\n    <!--\n  - Jump straight back out of wrapper mode on the home page.\n  -->\n\n</div><!-- /wrapper -->\n\n\n<section class=\"[ band  band--highlight ]  promo\">\n\n  <div class=\"wrapper  wrapper--wide\">\n\n    <ul class=\"layout  layout--large\">\n\n      <li class=\"layout__item  desk-one-third\">\n\n        <h2 class=\"heading\">Consultancy</h2>\n        <p>I provide CSS and performance consultancy to companies of all\n        sizes across the globe. From advice on how to work better as a\n        team, to how to scale a large codebase; how to rationalise the\n        design process, to how to write better quality responsive User\n        Interfaces.</p>\n\n      </li><li class=\"layout__item  lap-and-up-one-half  desk-one-third\">\n\n        <h2 class=\"heading\">Development</h2>\n        <p>I work on products and long-running projects, focusing on\n        scalability, maintainability, performance, and more. I usually\n        join product teams for short, initial kick-off sprints in order\n        to set up architectures and workflows, and to leave teams self\n        sufficient after I’ve left.</p>\n\n      </li><li class=\"layout__item  lap-and-up-one-half  desk-one-third\">\n\n        <h2 class=\"heading\">Workshops</h2> <p>I run workshops and\n        training sessions for existing teams, getting them up to scratch\n        and prepared for writing and managing front-ends that they\n        expect to grow. Performance concerns, workflows, design process,\n        and more, tailored to your company, products, and team.</p>\n\n      </li><li class=\"layout__item\">\n        <p class=\"promo__links\">\n          <a href=\"/services/\" class=\"btn  btn--secondary\">Learn more</a> <span class=\"promo__links-spacer\">or</span> <a href=\"/contact/\" class=\"btn\">Hire me</a>\n        </p>\n\n    </li></ul>\n\n  </div>\n\n</section>\n\n\n\n<section class=\"band  band--attention\" id=\"section:clients\" data-ui-component=\"Clients\">\n\n<div class=\"wrapper  wrapper--wide\">\n\n  <h3 title=\"Kickstarter\"> </a>\n    </li>\n\n  </ul>\n\n</div>\n\n</section>\n\n\n\n<section class=\"[ band  band--large  band--tint ]  mb\" id=\"section:carousel\" data-ui-component=\"Quotes carousel\">\n\n<div class=\"carousel\">\n\n  <ul class=\"carousel__panes\">\n\n    <li class=\"carousel__pane\">\n      <blockquote class=\"pull-quote  pull-quote--banner\">\n        <p>Harry helped our team level up their scalable CSS architecture skills, and to say that he had a large impact on our work is an understatement. We can’t recommend him enough.</p>\n        <b class=\"pull-quote__source\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/addyosmani\">Addy Osmani</a>, Google</b>\n      </blockquote>\n    </li>\n\n    <li class=\"carousel__pane\">\n      <blockquote class=\"pull-quote  pull-quote--banner\">\n        <p>Harry’s workshop was excellent; we left with tons of new ideas and techniques to improve both the CSS architecture and overall performance of <a href=\"http://behance.com/\" class=\"carousel__link\">Behance</a> and <a href=\"http://myportfolio.com/\" class=\"carousel__link\">Adobe Portfolio</a>.</p>\n        <b class=\"pull-quote__source\"><a href=\"http://jackiebalzer.com/\">Jackie Balzer</a>, Adobe</b>\n      </blockquote>\n    </li>\n\n    <li class=\"carousel__pane\">\n      <blockquote class=\"pull-quote  pull-quote--banner\">\n        <p>There’s a short list of people I whole-heartedly recommend for detailed performance work; Harry is right up there at the top.</p>\n        <b class=\"pull-quote__source\"><a href=\"https://timkadlec.com/\">Tim Kadlec</a></b>\n      </blockquote>\n    </li>\n\n    <li class=\"carousel__pane\">\n      <blockquote class=\"pull-quote  pull-quote--banner\">\n        <p>The CSS architecture I learned from Harry on <a href=\"/case-studies/nhs-nhsx-elearning-platform/\" class=\"carousel__link\">the NHS project</a> has changed the way I work. Bravo!</p>\n        <b class=\"pull-quote__source\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/joshnesbitt\">Josh Nesbitt</a></b>\n      </blockquote>\n    </li>\n\n    <li class=\"carousel__pane\">\n      <blockquote class=\"pull-quote  pull-quote--banner\">\n        <p>I learned more about CSS architecture in my three-day workshop with Harry than I did in the 10 years before.</p>\n        <b class=\"pull-quote__source\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/opus131\">Markus Klug</a></b>\n      </blockquote>\n    </li>\n\n  </ul>\n\n</div>\n\n</section>\n\n\n<div class=\"wrapper\">\n\n<div class=\"layout  layout--large\">\n    <div class=\"layout__item  lap-and-up-one-half  desk-two-thirds\" data-ui-component=\"Main content\">\n\n        <section class=\"post\" class=\"[ box  box--highlight ]  mb\">\n            <p>Hi there, I’m Harry. I am an <a href=\"https://thenetawards.com/previous-winners/\">award-winning</a> <b>Consultant Front-end Architect</b>, <b>designer</b>, <b>developer</b>, <b>writer</b> and <b>speaker</b> from the UK. I <a href=\"/archive/\">write</a>, <a href=\"https://twitter.com/csswizardry\">tweet</a>, <a href=\"/speaking/\">speak</a> and <a href=\"http://github.com/csswizardry\">share code</a> about authoring and scaling CSS for big websites. class=\"wrapper\">\n\n    <div class=\"layout\">\n        <section class=\"layout__item  desk-three-fifths  s-post\" data-ui-component=\"Main content\" itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Article\">\n\n            <time class=\"post__date\" datetime=\"\" itemprop=\"datePublished\"></time>\n\n            <h1 itemprop=\"name  headline\">404, Not Found</h1>\n\n            <p class=\"hide\">Written by <b itemprop=\"author\">Harry Roberts</b> on <b itemprop=\"publisher\">CSS Wizardry</b>.</p>\n\n            <p><strong>Yikes!</strong> I’m afraid it looks like this page doesn’t exist. There are a few\nthings you can do from here:</p>\n\n<ol>\n  <li><a href=\"/\">Head back to the home page</a></li>\n  <li><a href=\"https://www.google.com/search?q=site%3Acsswizardry.com+YOUR+SEARCH+TERM\">Search for what you were looking for</a></li>\n  <li><a href=\"/archive/\">Check the archives</a></li>\n</ol>\n\n<p>Hopefully one of those helps you out. If not, you can always <a href=\"https://twitter.com/csswizardry\">ask me on\nTwitter</a>.</p>\n\n<p>If you fancy just hanging around for a bit, you can read more <a href=\"/about/\">about\nme</a> and <a href=\"/services/\">my work</a>, you can sign up to <a href=\"/newsletter/\">my\nnewsletter</a>, or <a href=\"https://twitter.com/csswizardry\">follow me on\nTwitter</a>.</p>\n\n\n            \n\n        </section><section class=\"layout__item  desk-three-tenths  desk-push-one-tenth\" data-ui-component=\"Sub content\">\n\n            <p>Hi there, I’m Harry. I am an <a href=\"https://thenetawards.com/previous-winners/\">award-winning</a> <b>Consultant Front-end Architect</b>, <b>designer</b>, <b>developer</b>, <b>writer</b> and <b>speaker</b> from the UK. I <a href=\"/archive/\">write</a>, <a href=\"https://twitter.com/csswizardry\">tweet</a>, <a href=\"/speaking/\">speak</a> and <a href=\"http://github.com/csswizardry\">share code</a> about authoring and scaling CSS for big websites. You can <a href=\"/contact/\">hire me</a>.</p>\n\n<p><iframe id=\"twitter-widget-0\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" allowtransparency=\"true\" class=\"twitter-follow-button twitter-follow-button-rendered\" title=\"Twitter Follow Button\" src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets/follow_button.5c39137502ea1894df4434ae5ed041c5.en.html#dnt=false&amp;id=twitter-widget-0&amp;lang=en&amp;screen_name=csswizardry&amp;show_count=true&amp;show_screen_name=true&amp;size=m&amp;time=1492908095277\" style=\"position: static; visibility: visible; width: 227px; height: 20px;\" data-screen-name=\"csswizardry\"></iframe></p>\n\n<hr>\n\n<p class=\"text-banner\">\n  <a href=\"/services/\" class=\"btn  btn--full  btn--positive\">I am currently <strong>accepting new projects</strong> for Q1–2 2017</a>\n</p>\n\n<article class=\"[ box  box--highlight ]  mb\" data-ui-component=\"ad\">\n  <div class=\"adpacks\">\n  <script src=\"//cdn.carbonads.com/carbon.js?zoneid=1673&amp;serve=C6AILKT&amp;placement=csswizardrycom\" async=\"\" defer=\"\" id=\"_carbonads_js\"></script><div id=\"carbonads\"><span><span class=\"carbon-wrap\"><a href=\"//srv.carbonads.net/ads/click/x/GTND4237CVAIT23LCY74YKQWF67DEK77CE7D6Z3JCEAI627NCKAD653KC6BDLKJ7CTBIKK3EHJNCLSIZZRLCP7I35MNFV?segment=placement:csswizardrycom;&amp;encredirect=https%3A%2F%2Fslack.com%2Fis%3Fcvosrc%3Ddisplay.carbon.plain%20dev%26utm_source%3Dcarbon%26utm_medium%3Ddisplay%26utm_campaign%3Dplain%20dev%26c3ch%3DCarbon%20Networks%26c3nid%3DPlain%20Dev\" class=\"carbon-img\" target=\"_blank\"><img src=\"https://assets.servedby-buysellads.com/p/manage/asset/id/32052\" alt=\"\" border=\"0\" height=\"100\" width=\"130\" style=\"max-width: 130px;\"></a><a href=\"//srv.carbonads.net/ads/click/x/GTND4237CVAIT23LCY74YKQWF67DEK77CE7D6Z3JCEAI627NCKAD653KC6BDLKJ7CTBIKK3EHJNCLSIZZRLCP7I35MNFV?segment=placement:csswizardrycom;&amp;encredirect=https%3A%2F%2Fslack.com%2Fis%3Fcvosrc%3Ddisplay.carbon.plain%20dev%26utm_source%3Dcarbon%26utm_medium%3Ddisplay%26utm_campaign%3Dplain%20dev%26c3ch%3DCarbon%20Networks%26c3nid%3DPlain%20Dev\" class=\"carbon-text\" target=\"_blank\">All the tools your team needs in one place.
